content: I think I'll start by tracking my usage and setting a specific goal to limit my daily social media usage to under 30 minutes. I've tried website blockers before and found them helpful. I'll also try to schedule social media time and remove temptations by deleting the apps from my home screen. It's interesting that you mentioned finding alternative activities, as I've noticed that during my 10-day break, I had more time to read and exercise. I'll definitely try to prioritize those activities over social media.
